Uses of Class
net.i2p.router.tunnel.HopConfig

  • Packages that use HopConfig 
    Package Description
    net.i2p.router
    The I2P router application handles the I2P network communication.
    net.i2p.router.tunnel
    All the work of managing locally created and participating tunnels, creating and handling tunnel messages, and their encryption.

      The local router has joined the given tunnel operating in the given state.
